response.original_title: Erik Ten Hag - Making a Manager
response.overview: Long before he joined Ajax at the end of 2017, Erik ten Hag was considered the crown prince of modern Dutch coaching – a man who connected classic styles with that of a progressive ‘laptop coach’, someone who mixed data and statistics with what he saw on the pitch.  Ten Hag’s best attribute was understanding people, getting into the minds of footballers and seeing things the way they see it.
response.tagline: Erik Ten Hag - Making a Manager - Manchester United - Ajax
response.title: Erik Ten Hag - Making a Manager
